overview.en: in the early stage of the development of the EMC Chain. The production process of the digital product is: the digital currency index under a certain strategy is provided by the institution that specializes in providing the digital currency index. An index fund is issued by the
overview.zh: 區塊鏈上的原生代幣，用於交易、 支持 數字資產、支付區塊鏈交易手續費等。這是EMC 發展前期運營的主要數字資產類型。該數字資產的產生過程為：由專業提供數字貨幣指數的機構提供某策略下的數字貨幣指數。並由基金會在此基礎上發行出一個指數基金。
